EmailTemplate.name: RD DBAAC Template
EmailTemplate.subject: RA DBAAC - Rheumatoid Arthritis Drug Benefit Adjudication Advisory Committee
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello Doctors,
This week's cases have been posted in the Portal for your review. Link to the Portal
Meeting will be held on {!External_Committee__c.Start_Time__c}. Thank you to everyone who helped get these cases ready.
Please click on Log In to enter your username and password to view your cases.
Join on your computer or mobile app :
Click here to join the meeting
Back up Audio Only Login Phone Number:
1-778-401-6289
Phone Conference ID: 362 066 343
{!External_Committee__c.Email_Message__c}
{!External_Committee__c.Agenda__c}
Thank you
The Special Authority Team

Lekwungen and W̱SÁNEĆ nations
This email is intended only for the use of the individual or organization to whom it is addressed. It may contain information that is privileged or confidential. Any distribution, disclosure, copying, or other use by anyone else is strictly prohibited. If you have received this in error, please telephone or e-mail the sender immediately and delete the message.
